com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component
Class GOComponentMovement

java.lang.Object
  com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component.GOComponent
      com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component.GOComponentMovement
Direct Known Subclasses:
GOComponentFollowMovement
public abstract class GOComponentMovement
extends GOComponent

A component of this type implements movement on a macro level, that is, it can be given a target point in world coordinates and it will do its best (which can amount to as little or as much as the implementation cares) to get there. None of this will make much sense without a spatial component present, so it's very likely (bet on it) that one will be required.

Author:
til
